event.title: was formed along with its county in 1789

data.event: The town was formed along with its county in 1789, and settlement of the region began the same year.
In 1824, Arthur Power left Farmington with two of his sons and other Quakers to found Farmington, Michigan.

event.title: was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2007

data.event: The Farmington Quaker Crossroads Historic District was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2007.
